steps.name: A
steps.extract_prompt: 从用户输入提取时间范围，输出JSON: {"start_date": "YYYY-MM-DD", "end_date": "YYYY-MM-DD"}

steps.name: B
steps.extract_prompt: 结合用户输入与A输出，提取汇总维度，输出JSON: {"group_by": "day|week|month"}

steps.name: C
steps.extract_prompt: 基于用户输入与A/B输出，输出JSON: {"format": "pdf|xlsx", "title": "..."}

steps.name: A
steps.extract_prompt: 从用户输入提取两个数字，输出JSON: {"a": number, "b": number}
